Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Navippayuttaduka
Bāvīsaka (sāhāra)
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Navippayuttaduka
Bāvīsaka (sāhāra)
1776Navippayuttapaccayā nahetupaccayā (mūlakaṃ saṃkhittaṃ) naāhārapaccayā najhānapaccayā namaggapaccayā nasampayuttapaccayā nonatthipaccayā novigatapaccayā indriye ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
